import DomReplay from './domreplay';

export default DomReplay;

content:
export const Hud = require('./hud').default;
export default require('./domreplay/domreplay').default;

{
  "name": "domreplayhud",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "Hud for DOMReplay framework",
  "main": "lib/index.js",
  "scripts": {
    "start": "webpack-dev-server --open",
    "build": "webpack -p --config webpack.prod.js && npm run build-lib",
    "build-lib": "rm -rf lib && babel --plugins transform-es2015-modules-commonjs src/js -d lib",
    "watch": "babel --plugins transform-es2015-modules-commonjs src/js -d lib --watch",
    "build-docs": "esdoc",
    "open-docs": "open ./docs/index.html"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "Es6",
    "Webpack",
    "Sass"
  ],
  "author": "Eskil Opdahl Nordland",
  "license": "MIT",
  "dependencies": {
    "DOMReplay": "file:../DOMReplay"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "babel-core": "^6.26.0",
    "babel-loader": "^7.1.2",
    "babel-plugin-transform-es2015-modules-commonjs": "^6.26.0",
    "babel-polyfill": "^6.26.0",
    "babel-preset-es2015": "^6.24.1",
    "css-loader": "^0.28.7",
    "esdoc": "^1.0.4",
    "esdoc-custom-theme": "^1.4.2",
    "esdoc-publish-html-plugin": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "extract-text-webpack-plugin": "^3.0.1",
    "node-sass": "^4.7.2",
    "sass-loader": "^6.0.6",
    "style-loader": "^0.19.0",
    "webpack": "^3.8.1",
    "webpack-dev-server": "^2.9.3",
    "webpack-merge": "^4.1.0"
  }
}
name: package.json
